summary: This is an email from a Victim-Witness Assistant at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, forwarding notification of charges filed and a status hearing for Jeffrey Epstein, along with an attached list of victims from the Victim Notification System (VNS).

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case referenced in the email subject line and attachments; charges have been filed and a status hearing is scheduled.

persons.name: Victim-Witness Assistant
persons.context: The sender of the email, working at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, responsible for notifying victims about case updates.

events.title: Charges Filed and Status Hearing Notification
events.description: Notification is sent regarding charges filed against Jeffrey Epstein and an upcoming status hearing in his criminal case.

locations: 1 St. Andrews Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The email confirms that formal charges have been filed against Jeffrey Epstein in the Southern District of New York (case docket 19-CR-00490).
A list of victims is maintained in the Victim Notification System (VNS) and they are being notified of the charges and a status hearing.
The email is dated July 11, 2019, which is shortly after Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019, indicating early stages of the federal prosecution.
The attachments include a victim list in Excel format and a draft PDF document, suggesting ongoing case preparation and victim outreach.
